{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$17.9K in 2021-2022** on contracts with FIDELITY ENGINEERING CONSTRUCTION.

Across 8 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (25%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 31% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$655.8K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.73 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$730.0K. The longest contract was 1.27 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.2M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
